title: Need Help With Changing Settings
body: Hello everyone I am writing i  hope of finding an answer. I want to know if there is any way I can disable MiddleClickDragScroll? I tried changing the MiddleClickDragScrollEnabled in persisted settings to 0 resetting client and to no avail. I also tried changing roller button speed to 0 and no results. If anyone has suggestions would be very much appreciated.

replies.body:
If you're trying to disable the drag scroll feature, you can do that through the settings in the client. 

- Go into your settings and pick Hotkeys on the left under in-game
- Scroll down and click on camera control to expand it
- Look for the next to last option titled Drag Scroll

It should be bound to Mouse Button 3 by default. If you click on that and pick Unbind, you should be set!
